pageProps.content:
Experience

One & Only Nyungwe House is a luxury retreat situated on the edge of the ancient Nyungwe Forest in Rwanda, the largest mountain rainforest in Africa.
Set within a beautiful, working tea plantation, One & Only Nyungwe House offers exciting wildlife activities, up-close encounters with rare primates & exotic birds as well as tailor-made experiences like gastronomic forest picnics.

Stay

One & Only Nyungwe House features 22 air-conditioned luxury suites in 6 beautiful wooden villas – each with in-room fireplaces & exceptional views of the Nyungwe Forest & surrounding mountains.
There are one-bedroom & two-bedroom suites, each luxuriously designed to give clients a unique 5-star experience.
The one-bedroom suites feature superb stand-alone tubs, wilderness-view showers & private decks while the two-bedroom suites offer the same as the one-bedroom suites, except for an additional bedroom as well as an elegant living & dining room.
The family-friendly two-bedroom suite is secluded & comes with an open-air jacuzzi.
The main area comprises a patio bar, tea lounge, gym & health spa.

Activities

Guests can enjoy a variety of exciting activities, including guided walks through the national park as well as mountain biking & kayaking.
There is also a gym to work up a sweat as well as an open-air spa where relaxing treatments can be enjoyed.
Wilderness picnics & private dinners are ideal for couples or families in need of a little privacy.
